name: Pegasus-5: Gone Astray
description: You are a new recruit aboard a trade ship, set to make a standard route. However, things go wrong and the ship gets lost in space. You will need to build rep with your crewmates, make hard decisions, and avoid organized gangs operating in space in order for you and your crewmates to get through this.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU Storage: 400 MB available space
